subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony was 5 for 14 with 15 points as the Knicks committed 23 turnovers, which led to 24 Cavaliers points, and made only 42 percent of their shots.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony was 5 for 14 with 15 points as the Knicks committed 23 turnovers, which led to 24 Cavaliers points, and made only 42 percent of their shots.
